title: How to turn great research into a great paper
description: Writing may represent only an infinitesimal part of your work as a researcher, but it can make or break how all the other aspects are perceived. In the current scientific culture, your written output and its impact are the measures of your success, so you better bring your A game when preparing any publication. Here are some of the most important aspects that set a great paper apart from an average one (apart from the actual results, of course!).
